DOC.brief_summary: Approximately 120 female volunteer request pregnancy test recruit locally UK trial centre . Volunteers require use Clearblue Pregnancy Test accord product instruction , provide urine sample void . Trained technician conduct second test urine sample .
DOC.brief_title: Clearblue Home Pregnancy Test Consumer Study
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 120 female volunteer attend study site request pregnancy test recruit locally UK trial centre . Volunteers require use Clearblue Pregnancy Test accord product instruction , provide urine sample void . Trained technician conduct second test urine sample evaluate performance consumer technician testing .
DOC.criteria: 1845 year old Female Requesting pregnancy test
